title: Story Generator App
description: A single-page application that allows users to generate creative stories based on their input preferences and prompts

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Main landing page where users can start generating stories with various customization options

pages.name: Story Viewer
pages.purpose: Display generated story with navigation controls and sharing options

ui_components: Header with app title and navigation
Story generation form with category, length, and style selectors
Story display area with formatted text
Share story button with social media options
Save story button with local storage
state: userInput: {category: string, length: string, style: string, customPrompt: string}
generatedStory: {title: string, content: string, timestamp: Date}
interactions: User fills form fields and clicks Generate button
App fetches story from API with current form values
Loading spinner appears while waiting for response
Generated story displays in story viewer
User can navigate between previous/next stories in history
User can save current story to local storage
User can share story via social media or copy link
User can return to home page to generate new story
Error handling for API failures or invalid inputs
acceptance_criteria: Responsive design that works on mobile and desktop
Smooth loading states with spinner animation
Story content displays properly formatted with line breaks
Navigation between stories in history works correctly
Share functionality provides social sharing options
Error messages display appropriately for API failures
Generated stories are unique based on input parameters
App loads quickly with minimal initial bundle size
